queryMapper.query: SELECT EN.*, C.NAME AS CUSTOMER_NAME, SCE.EMAIL_ID AS CUSTOMER_EMAIL, SCC.CONTACT_NUMBER AS CUSTOMER_CONTACT_NUMBER, T.NAME AS TUTOR_NAME, RTE.EMAIL_ID AS TUTOR_EMAIL, RTC.CONTACT_NUMBER AS TUTOR_CONTACT_NUMBER, IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E WHERE E.USER_ID = EN.WHO_ACTED), EN.WHO_ACTED) AS WHO_ACTED_NAME FROM ENQUIRY EN INNER JOIN SUBSCRIBED_CUSTOMER C ON EN.CUSTOMER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN SUBSCRIBED_CUSTOMER_EMAIL_ID SCE ON EN.CUSTOMER_ID = SCE.CUSTOMER_ID AND SCE.IS_PRIMARY = 'Y' INNER JOIN SUBSCRIBED_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_NUMBER SCC ON EN.CUSTOMER_ID = SCC.CUSTOMER_ID AND SCC.IS_PRIMARY = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN REGISTERED_TUTOR T ON EN.TUTOR_ID = T.TUTOR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN REGISTERED_TUTOR_EMAIL_ID RTE ON EN.TUTOR_ID = RTE.TUTOR_ID AND RTE.IS_PRIMARY = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN REGISTERED_TUTOR_CONTACT_NUMBER RTC ON EN.TUTOR_ID = RTC.TUTOR_ID AND RTC.IS_PRIMARY = 'Y'
UPDATE ENQUIRY SET MATCH_STATUS = :matchStatus, WHO_ACTED = :whoActed, LAST_ACTION_DATE_MILLIS = :lastActionDateMillis, ADMIN_REMARKS = :adminRemarks WHERE ENQUIRY_ID = :enquiryId

UPDATE ENQUIRY SET MATCH_STATUS = :matchStatus, TUTOR_ID = :tutorId, IS_MAPPED = :isMapped, WHO_ACTED = :whoActed, LAST_ACTION_DATE_MILLIS = :lastActionDateMillis, ADMIN_REMARKS = :adminRemarks WHERE ENQUIRY_ID = :enquiryId

INSERT INTO ENQUIRY (CUSTOMER_ID, ENQUIRY_EMAIL, ENQUIRY_CONTACT_NUMBER, SUBJECT, GRADE, MATCH_STATUS, LOCATION_DETAILS, ADDRESS_DETAILS, ADDITIONAL_DETAILS, ENTRY_DATE_MILLIS) VALUES (:customerId, :enquiryEmail, :enquiryContactNumber, :subject, :grade, :matchStatus, :locationDetails, :addressDetails, :additionalDetails, :entryDateMillis)
